statements: SELECT * FROM dance_event_attendance;
SELECT event_name, event_date, participant_name FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE participant_age > 18;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT event_name, participant_name, participant_gender FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE participant_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM dance_event_attendance ORDER BY event_date DESC, participant_age ASC
SELECT event_name, participant_name FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE participant_age > 25 AND participant_gender = 'Female'
SELECT event_id, event_name, participant_name FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY event_name
SELECT participant_name, COUNT(*) as attendance_count FROM dance_event_attendance GROUP BY participant_name HAVING attendance_count > 1
SELECT event_name AS 'Event Title', participant_name AS 'Participant Name' FROM dance_event_attendance WHERE event_date >= '2021-10-01'
SELECT * FROM event_attendance;
SELECT event_id, attendance_date, check_in_time FROM event_attendance WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM participant_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT event_id, check_in_time, check_out_time FROM event_attendance ORDER BY attendance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM participant_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM event_attendance WHERE attendance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_id, participant_id, check_in_time FROM event_attendance WHERE participant_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM participant_demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT participant_id, email FROM participant_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM event_attendance JOIN participant_demographics ON event_attendance.participant_id = participant_demographics.participant_id;
SELECT * FROM dance_events;
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_date FROM dance_events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age FROM participant_demographics WHERE participant_age > 30;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, target_audience FROM promotional_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dance_events WHERE attendee_count > 50;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM dance_events WHERE attendee_count > 100 ORDER BY event_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM participant_demographics WHERE participant_age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 AND participant_gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM promotional_strategies WHERE strategy_name LIKE '%social%' ORDER BY strategy_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_count FROM dance_events WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01' AND event_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience FROM promotional_strategies WHERE target_audience IN ('Students', 'Professionals') ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM dance_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM dance_events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT participant_name, age, gender FROM participants WHERE event_id = 1 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT demographic_id, occupation, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT strategy_name, cost FROM marketing_strategies WHERE cost < 1000;
SELECT * FROM dance_events ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_name ASC
SELECT participant_name, age FROM participants WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT demographics.occupation, demographics.income, participants.participant_name FROM demographics INNER JOIN participants ON demographics.participant_id=participants.participant_id
SELECT event_name, location FROM dance_events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND event_date < '2022-12-31'
SELECT strategy_name, cost FROM marketing_strategies ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT * FROM dance_events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM dance_events WHERE venue_id = 1;
SELECT venue_name FROM venues WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT participant_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM participants ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, cost FROM promotional_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_date, venue_id FROM dance_events;
SELECT * FROM participants WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT venue_name, location FROM venues WHERE venue_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY gender DESC, age ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, platform, cost FROM promotional_strategies WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
